Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2012 03:22PM Puppetgirl4z wrote: Thank you both so much for your quick and compassionate replies.  I do feel better after just reading the posts.  I  just have to put on my "big girl pants" and do it.  I can see that this site is a huge resource and am so appreciative of having it to turn to.  I will keep everyone posted on what happens and send you all my good thoughts.
